doc: Updated and cleaned up Kubernetes + OpenShift examples
doc: Updated and cleaned up Kubernetes + OpenShift examples

timeline.bodyText: I see this pattern in other tests too. Why are we removing final modifier for KubernetesClient?
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText: It's not bad, only redundant. When you declare the variable in the resources block, those variables are effectively final.
replies.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: I may have even introduced some of those in the first place. But I'm trying to make the examples more or less uniform and consistent (still lots to do there)
replies.author: manusa

timeline.bodyText: We should either use logger created above everywhere or System.out.println.
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText: I left some of the examples with System.out|err (those annotated with @SuppressWarnings("java:S106")), since the output stream is used later on either to print stuff (logs in this case), or as a parameter (see Exec examples).
replies.author: manusa
